channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 06:22 Driven the alarm to Sinelnikov District.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 游릭 06:22 Driven the alarm to Sinelnikov District.Creck on further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
